Olivia Whitfield-Heap

Owner & Message Therapist

Your Canine Massage Therapist

Olivia has completed canine massage & rehabilitation training with AIAT (The Academy of Integrative Animal Therapies), UK Rural Skills accredited, aligned to level 5, and is passionate about improving your dog’s health and wellbeing.

She is a member of IAAT (International Association of Animal Therapists), holds valid professional & public liability insurance and is dog first aid trained.

She has also completed additional training in the use of Photizo Vetcare LED therapy. Massage sessions normally take place at the Wolds Canine Massage clinic room, based near Spilsby, providing a relaxing and comfortable environment for your dog.

Outside of canine massage Olivia is also a clinical pharmacist working in primary care.
